Mendokusai

Tartarus

Pride

08 Feb 2020

It has been an odd day, cacophanous with feelings. But above all, possibly for one of the first times ever, I am genuinely proud of myself. Maybe not under the most glowing of circumstances, but progress has been clearly made today.
